name: @tpmjs/search-registry
description: AI SDK tool for searching the TPMJS tool registry

tools.description: Search the TPMJS tool registry to find AI SDK tools by keyword, category, or description. Returns tool metadata for dynamic loading.

returns.description: Search results with tool metadata including packageName, exportName, version, importUrl

aiAgent.useCase: Use when you need a tool that isn't currently available. Search for tools by keyword or domain.
examples: Search for 'weather' when asked about weather
Search for 'wikipedia' when asked to search Wikipedia
Search for 'database' when working with SQL
